price: Maka setelah mereka lemparkan, Musa  berkata, "Apa yang kamu lakukan itu, itulah yang sihir, sesungguhnya Allah akan menampakkan ketidakbenarannya".  Sesungguhnya Allah tidak akan membiarkan terus berlangsungnya pekerjaan orang-orang yang membuat kerusakan.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ مَا جِئۡتُم بِهِ ٱلسِّحۡرُۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَيُبۡطِلُهُۥٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُصۡلِحُ عَمَلَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā alqaw qāla mūsā mā ji'tum bihi al-siḥ'ru inna al-laha sayub'ṭiluhu inna al-laha lā yuṣ'liḥu ʿamala al-muf'sidīna
